attributes.additional_details: Early detection for breast cancer is essential, these clinics are vital and are being cancelled due to staff being sent to covid areas. These clinics need to be ring fenced and kept safe so breast cancer screening can go ahead
attributes.background: Rapid access breast clinics have been cancelled because of covid leading to unacceptable delays. These clinics need to take priority and not be cancelled

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a clinical and operational matter for NHS England and individual NHS trusts.
